about.name: Preetham Mukundan
about.bio: Award-winning game developer with 10 years of experience in Unreal Engine and 2 years of industry experience. Proficient in gameplay systems, AI development, and network programming. Recognized for excellence in programming and game development at Vancouver Film School.

projects.title: Spray N Pray
projects.shortDescription: Award-winning game developed in Unreal Engine 5 featuring advanced AI systems and custom EQS implementations.

mechanics.title: Advanced AI Systems
mechanics.description: Implemented custom EQS Generators and Tests for various enemy types, with designer-configurable variables for diverse AI behaviors. Created sophisticated Behavior Trees, Decorators, and Tasks for multiple enemy types.

mechanics.title: Custom Movement System
mechanics.description: Developed a specialized movement and pathfinding system for flying enemies, enhancing gameplay dynamics and challenge.

projects.title: Zerolock
projects.shortDescription: Networked movement-based game in Unreal Engine 5 with advanced mobility mechanics

mechanics.title: Advanced Movement System
mechanics.description: Fully networked movement system featuring sprint, crouch, slide, wall jump, and zipline mechanics for fluid traversal.

mechanics.title: Gameplay Ability System
mechanics.description: Implemented networked abilities using the Gameplay Ability System plugin for synchronized player actions across the network.

games.title: Spray N Pray (Build)
games.description: Playable build of Spray N Pray.

experience.description: Developed a sophisticated Construction Tool enabling players to place, rotate, scale, and modify assets with material changes and light source management. Implemented an Azure-powered speech-to-text system for interactive user responses.
Prototyped and implemented game mechanisms, optimized code for performance and space efficiency, and conducted thorough testing and debugging of existing game code.

education.description: Awarded best programmer and best final project (Spray N Pray). Developed multiple console games and worked on team projects including a movement-based FPS game.

education.degree: Master of Technology in Software Engineering
education.description: Mastered multiple programming languages while developing real-world websites, AI models, and applications in team environments.
Focused on business management with hands-on projects and created business and marketing plans in diverse team settings.
